inn1.comm: Jongwe strikes. Good length and outside off, Liton inches half forward as he aims to drive. He can only slice it to backward point, where Cremer takes a good overhead catch. Litton gone for a six-ball duck
sliding into the pads, picked away through backward square leg with the wrists
full and attacking the stumps, blocked
tight line on middle, as Tamim strides forward to block it
full and outside off, steered to gully, where Williams fumbles a bit, and gives away a single
pretty stroke. Width on offer, Tamim bends his knee and creams a drive past the covers. Away she whistles to the boundary
banged in short on a leg-stump line, Tamim swivels on the back toe as he half-pulls and half-whips behind square on the leg side
good length and on middle, Tamim steps forward and defends it back to the bowler
veering onto the pads, Tamim twirls his wrists and puts it away wide of midwicket
darted onto the pads, chipped in front of midwicket
full on middle, Mahmudullah bends low to block it to leg
tight line on off, Mahmudullah covers up in defence
good length and outside off, pushed into the covers
length and curls back in, more with the angle, leaving Mahmudullah prodding. He manages an inside edge onto it
floated full and outside off. That's too full and Mahmudullah latches onto it, flaying a drive past the covers
back of a length and on middle, tapped back to the bowler
pitched up and around off, dabbed defensively in front of the covers. Tamim seeks a quick single.... No dice
nice and full on off again, disciplined stuff. Tamim presses forward and blocks it in front of cover
back of a length and outside off, punchily driven to mid-off
Tamim races down the track like a charging elephant and launches it straight down the ground. He punches gloves with Mahmudullah
Jongwe pulls his length back and gets some away movement. Tamim leaves it be
good length and on a fourth-stump line, defended
dug in short and outside off, left alone
full and just a shade outside off, ignored again
Tamim slithers across the off stump and pats this length ball back to the bowler
good length and pushed outside off, Mahmudullah lets it pass
back of a length and outside off, punched to backward point, who dives to his left and intercepts the ball
back of a length and no real lateral movement, glided to backward point
dug in short and attacking top of off, Mahmudullah drops back and quells it a couple of feet in front of him
errant ball, veering down leg, glanced with the angle to long leg
too full and straight, tucked away around the corner, behind square on the leg side
back of a length, skiddy ball on off, chopped towards gully
back of a length and on off, defended back to the bowler
fuller and on off, feebly prodded back to the bowler
Panyangara nips out Mahmudullah with an inducker. Back of a length and cuts back in off the seam, shoots through the gate and hits middle. Mahmudullah was crease-bound and paid the penalty
full and darted just a shade outside off, driven towards the covers
similar line and length, Mushfiq gets forward and eases it to backward point, where Cremer takes his eyes off it, tossing away a single
Tamim presses forward, gets close to the line of this off-stump ball and blocks
length and outside off, Mushfiq wants to lash it away. He ends up skewing it to the covers off the inside half of the bat
length and on middle and leg as Mushfiq shuffles across to defend it in front of square leg
back of a length and outside off, chopped towards backward point, where Cremer flings to his right and makes another smart stop
back of a length and on middle, tucked to midwicket
precise placement. Pitched up and on middle and leg, flicked in the gap between midwicket and mid-on
cracker of a hit. Wide half-volley outside off, Mushfiq makes it look even worse by thrashing a drive past the covers
slippery slow lifter, Tamim swivel-pulls it to long leg
good length and angled in on middle, Mushfiq shuffles across and his attempted flick only meets with thin air
back of a length and on off, forward defence
good length and nibbles away outside off, poked to third man off the outside half of the bat
back of a length and outside off, Tamim punchily drives it to short cover, presenting a high elbow
nice and full, just a shade outside off, patted to the covers
far too full and outside off, Mushfiq lunges forward and eases it to the left of covers. Nicely driven on the up
wide line outside off, flayed to deep cover
Tamim throws his bat at a drive ends up jamming it back to the bowler
back of a length and targetting the top of middle but Tamim's defence intervenes
clipped from an off-stump line to midwicket
good length and on middle, blocked back to the bowler
starts off with a half-tracker outside off, which is cut to sweeper cover off the back foot
looped up on middle, worked to midwicket
good length and slides on middle, Tamim puts his bat in front of the pad and defends
straight ball on off, defended off the front foot
nurdled off the pads towards square leg
tickled off the pads towards square leg, again
good length and on off, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, may have been a cross-seamer, Mushfiq goes hard on a drive and mishits it to the covers
fullish and on off, blocked to leg
lovely batting from Mushfiq. He rides the bounce of this short one outside off and late-cuts it to third man
Tamim shows his ace early as he runs down the track. The bowler goes wide and pulls his length back as well but Tamim manages to carve it over backward point
Tamim steps out again, Muzarabani digs it short, directing at the ribs. Tamim adjusts and drops it to the leg side, adjacent to the pitch
extra bounce on this good length ball on off, dabbed wide of slip
full and straight, Mushfiq goes low and slog-sweeps it through backward square leg
lobbed up on middle, Tamim stretches forward to smother any menace
straight on off, defended off the front foot
darted short and outside off, Mushfiq leans back and cuts it away backward of point
picked away off the pads through backward square leg
glanced off the pads towards long leg, using soft hands
darted short and skids on off, Mushfiq tunes up for a pull and ends up dragging it to long-on
diverted off the pads to long leg as this was too full and straight
speared on a shortish length, blocked back
flighted and on off, Tamim bends forward in defence
spinning down leg, off the thigh pad and wanders away fine on the leg side
hurled short again, much like the first ball. Forced down to long-on
turn and bounce. Cremer lands this on middle and gets it to rip past the outside edge. Mushfiq was left wafting and missing
drifting down the leg side, neatly paddled to long leg
slides on outside off, chopped to covers off the back foot
speared down leg again, Tamim can't meet with a slog-sweep. More wides
full and a hint of flight on middle, clam push down the ground, to long-on
good length and on off, defended off the front foot
pushed through outside off, steered through the covers for one
forced down to long-on
dangled through outside off, spins away. Cut away wide of the covers
full and on middle and leg, clipped to cow corner
dabbed towards gully with soft hands for one
length and on middle, deflected towards square leg
heading down the leg side, glanced to long leg
loopier on off, sound defence from Mushfiq
chopped towards point off the back foot
spins back in from over the wicket, blocked to leg
Tamim thumps it away.. He sinks low, fetches it from outside off and slugs it over backward square leg, clears the rope
pushed outside off, slog-swept away again, behind square on the leg side
darted outside off, cracked off the back foot to deep cover
Tamim leans back and forces it to the covers
full and slides on middle, punched back to the bowler
Tamim leans back and punches it straight to backward point
shortish and outside off, Tamim keeps back and guides it in front of point
loopier on middle, patted back to the bowler
pitched up on middle, milked in front of midwicket
drilled down the ground for one
Mushfiq held nothing back here. He slinks down the pitch and slogs it over midwicket
chopped off the back foot to the left of backward point
punched down to long-off for an ambled single
nice and full outside off, down the pitch and sliced over the covers. The man in the deep (Muzarabani) did not spot it, with the sun squinting into his eyes
Tamim has been undone by the slowness of the pitch. He attempts to launch it down the ground but ends up playing a one-handed mis-hit, which settles into the hands of Jongwe at long-on
pushed through outside off, Mushfiq cracks a cut in front of square
tucked away to the leg side and Mushfiq reaches a fifty as the crowd roars
short and width outside off, Shakib loves it there. He sits back and cuts it away to the right of backward point
back of a length and outside off, steered to backward point
banged in short, Shakib rolls his wrists and pulls it past midwicket
full and drifting into the pads, whirl of the wrists as Shakib whips it to the midwicket boundary

Mutumbami takes the bails off. A crude heave and a miss from Shakib. Raza's footing is fine. He gives this loads of air outside off, luring Shakib out of the crease. Shakib can't connect and Bangladesh have been set back further
full and on middle, blocked
too full and straight, tucked around the corner, behind square
Mushfiq steps forward and eases this full one from outside off to deep third man with an open face
Jongwe bends his back and delivers a short ball outside off. Nothing doing from Sabbir
pretty full and outside off, Sabbir keeps back and jabs it to the covers
helped behind the square-leg umpire
floated on off from round the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
smoothly driven down to long-off
Mushfiq nearly loops it to short fine leg. Sliding onto the leg stump, Mushfiq shapes for a sweep and top-edges it. Ervine throws himself onto the ground but the ball just dies in front of him
back of a length and down leg, Mushfiq can't lay bat on it. The keeper moves to his left to gather the wide, and is struck on the ankle. Mutumbami is down and is being tended to by the physio
pitched up and on off, patted defensively to cover
full and on middle, flicked to midwicket
full toss outside off, probably above the waistline. Instead of powering the free-hit away, Sabbir jams it towards covers
banged in short and outside off, slogged to deep square leg
Mushfiq rides the bounce of this short one outside off as he steers it deftly to third man
Mushfiq comes down the pitch and drives it to mid-off
short on middle from round the wicket, pulled strongly to deep midwicket
Mushfiq treks down the pitch and murders this over cow corner
paddled down to long leg, neatly done
flighted on off, dropped towards point with soft hands
slides on middle, slog-swept away to Williams at deep square leg
tossed up and rips away past the hanging bat with extra bounce. Good work from Waller
dropped short as Mushfiq rocks back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
pretty straight, Sabbir nails a slog sweep to the midwicket boundary. He did well to roll his wrists on it
dug in short on off, half-pulled and half-heaved to deep midwicket
length and on off, Sabbir keeps back and turns it in front of square
slides on middle, chopped past point off the back foot
arrows in with the angle on middle, punchily blocked back
Williams gives this more air as Sabbir bends forward in defence
dragged short, clubbed away to wide long-on. Not off the middle of the bat
length and just a shade outside off, glided to third man
disciplined stuff. Good length and holds its line on off, steered to point
veering down leg, takes the pad on its way to the stand-in keeper Waller
good length and outside off again, late-cut to third man
served up wide outside off, Mushfiq sends it clattering past backward point. Firm cut
full and skiddy on off, Mushfiq stoops low and keeps it out
fullish and on middle, Sabbir jumps out of the crease and golf-swings it over long-on. Big strike!
slid too wide outside off, left alone
googly, cracked straight to cover
biting legbreak outside off, beaten on the late cut. Loads of extra bounce as well
Mushfiq tunes up for a reverse sweep, gets a scintilla of a tickle and rolls it fine on the off side, beating the keeper
length and outside off, swung away over mid-on
full and on the stumps, drilled back to the bowler, who sticks his left boot out and deflects it wide of mid-off. 200 up for the hosts
pushed through full and down leg, Mushfiqur goes down on one knee, and sweeps it away through backward square leg
back of a length and rises on off, Mushfiq, though, calmly guides it to third man
dragged short and outside off, hacked to deep midwicket

Jongwe delivers a lifter outside off, Mushfiq hooks with a top edge. Panyangara runs across from long leg, dives full-stretch to his left, sticks his left hand out, but can't cling on/it did not stick into it for a one-handed screamer. Doughty attempt, however, and that's applauded by Jongwe
pitched up on off, pushed to mid-off
looks like a slower ball on off, dabbed defensively to point
Sabbir shapes for a lap-sweep but Muzarabani is wary of it as he pulls his length back outside off to beat the batsman comfortably
full and on middle, poked to the right of the bowler. Mushfiq takes a couple of steps down, Sabbir reciprocates but is belatedly sent back but the bowler can't zing a direct hit
banged in short and rises outside off, pulled away to long-on, though not firmly
back of a length and outside off, Mushfiq hangs back and scythes it to deep cover
bang! Jongwe does not get hold of the yorker, he dishes out a full toss, which is marmalised over long-on. He went low on one knee and dismissed it out of his sight
short and outside off, Sabbir ramps it away. The ball bursts through the hands of a leaping short third man. That shot brings up Sabbir's half-century
low full toss on off, which is flicked towards deep midwicket
Mushfiq moves onto 99 with another flick to deep midwicket as Muzarabani does not get hold of the yorker. Full toss, which is picked away
back of a length and on off, Mushfiq twirls his wrists and plays it towards long-on. He eases the helmet off his head, roars, and raises the bat to acknowledge the applause. 4th ODI ton for Mushfiqur
full and darted on off, driven down to long-on
slower ball outside off. Mushfiq, having run down the track, adjusts and cracks it square on the off side
full and hurled wide outside off, past the tramline as Mushfiq flays and misses
low full toss on off, Mushfiq sinks to one knee but can only scoop it in front of long-off
Sabbir slinks away outside off, the bowler follows him. Forced to long-off
length and outside off, Mushfiqur throws his bat at it and edges it through the vacant cordon

Cremer lasers a direct hit and sends back Sabbir for 57. Panyangara nearly nails the yorker length as Mushfiq jabs it away towards backward point. Sabbir responds but is not quick enough. Cremer had only one stump to aim but hit the bullseye
fractionally short and outside off, slash and a miss
back of a length and outside off, Nasir wants to launch it out of Mirpur... but only connects with a whole lot of thin air
speared full at the base of off, Mushfiq drills a drive and finds long-off

Nasir dances out and goes through with his attempted hook though his balance was foiled with the shortening of the length. Holes out to deep backward square leg and becomes the second Bangladesh batsman to bag a duck this innings, after Liton

Another direct hit, another wicket for Zimbabwe. Mushfiq is way short of the crease. Banged in, Mashrafe rises with it as he directs it to backward point and sets off for a single. Cremer is in business again. So, it takes a pin-point direct hit to end Mushfiq's superbly-controlled knock
good length and just a shade outside off, patted in front of cover. Instead of throwing at the keeper's end, the fielder flings a throw at the non-strikers' and misses
very full and on off, Mashrafe loads up and drills it down to mid-off
low full toss, dips on off, bunted to the left of Panyangara
tucked away off the pads to deep fine leg
right in the blockhole but the line is wide outside off, angled to third man
bumpy short ball down the leg side, Sunny was not in control of the hook, top-edging it over Mutumbami Waller
another slippery bouncer, slow in pace. Sunny is tricked by it as he is early into the hook, and ends up wearing it on the body
nailed in at the base of middle and off, dug out to the covers
low full toss, Mashrafe sizes it up and tonks it over square leg
this is even bigger! Muzarabani gets the yorker wrong again, slips another low full toss. This is punished over wide long-on

four, six, and out! Muzarabani turns to the slower ball and removes Mashrafe. The Bangladesh captain has done his job, though, injecting late impetus, despite the loss of three wickets in a space of six balls. This was a touch full on off, Mashrafe loads up but can't generate enough power. Long-on snags the catch
full and on middle, Sunny drills it down the ground, between the bowler and non-striker, beats the diving fielder in the deep
fractionally short and outside off, Sunny smashes it away past midwicket. Skedaddles away to the boundary
nice and full on middle, hacked down to long-on. They push for two but Sunny is caught short on the second run as Waller runs in, collects the ball, and disturbs the furniture

inn2.comm: beaten first up! Not an offcutter. Good length and largely holds its line outside off, Chamu pushes away from the body and has no clue about this
full and curls in, jammed onto the pads off an inside snick
good length and keeps going away outside off
short, rising ball on off, quelled in front of the covers
pitched up and outside off, Chamu watches it through to the keeper
back of a length and angled in the channel again, Chamu leaves it be
push-and-run single down the ground to end the over
full and on middle, no turn. Nudged to midwicket
straight roller on middle, worked to the leg side
slides on off, holds its line. The batsman plays for the turn and trickles it past the leg stump off an inside edge. Close shave, that
floated on middle, Sunny gives this more air. Patted back to the bowler
Sunny drags his length back on off. Chamu goes on the back foot to defend this
pacy lifter, angling away outside off. Chamu wants to ramp it over the cordon but Mustafiz is too quick for the batsman
nice and full now, slides away with the angle outside off from over the wicket as Chamu shoulders arms
fullish and hugging the off stump, knocked defensively to the covers
sliding into the pads, a fumble at square leg allows an extra run
this does not bounce much. Full and keeps moving away with the angle outside off, beats the hanging bat
back of a length and zings through the channel outside off. Jongwe seeks to run it down to third man, perhaps..... No avail
heading down leg, glanced fine
Sunny gives this ample air on off, seduces Jonge to drive. He can only get an inner edge onto the pad
pushed back down the pitch as this was full and straight
flat and fired on middle, Jongwe brings out a reverse-slap and sends it over backward point.. Whoa, where did that come from
darted flat and quick, blocked towards gully
the batsman shimmies down, does not meet the pitch, and takes it on the thigh pad
zippy back of a length ball that curls away outside off with the angle. Jongwe angles his bat and is beaten
intent from Jongwe. He advances and punts this length ball just over Mahmudullah at mid-off
full and angled away outside off, ignored

Mustafiz drops a return catch. This looks like a cutter from the back of the hand. The batsman is undone by the lack of pace. He pushes and lobs it back, Mustafiz leaps but can't hold on. He can only parry it over
length and outside off, helped to third man
Mustafiz attacks the stumps and gets some movement, Chamu is opened up a touch as he pokes it towards the covers
slides on off, Jongwe makes room but can only block it quietly
three fielders converge on a sliced hit but Jongwe is safe. Flighted on middle, skewed over the covers. There is nobody sweeping on the off side
looped up and spins, he steps out and takes it on the pad as the ball pops to Mushfiq. The caught-behind appeal is shot down
better connection from Jongwe. He steps out and pumps it over the covers; one-bounce four
hurled short on middle, punched to the left of the bowler off the back foot
half-volley on the leg stump, picked up and dispatched over midwicket with a twirl of wrists
pitched up and zips across off, Chamu attempts a leg-side whip, and misses
another leg-stump ball, this should have also been put away. Off the pad and rolls in front of square
Mustafiz wears a wry smile on his face. Fullish and cuts away outside off, he pushes and is beaten
full and on middle, hoisted over mid-off
looped up on off, chipped in front of long-off
nicely tossed up again, carved over backward point
pitched up on middle, pokey drive to covers
slides on quick, kept out
down the pitch and heaved over midwicket. Not off the middle, but no problem
darted wide outside off, sliced in front of backward point
back of a length and on off, defended carefully
picked away off the pads to long leg
skiddy ball on off, defensively pushed to the covers
Jonge makes ample room outside off but slithers across to meet this short ball on off with a forward defence
fractionally short and outside off, Jongwe steps out and deposits it over long-off for a six!
pitched up and on middle, push driven to the covers

Excellent catch from Liton. Long-off and Long-on nearly collided but Liton hangs on. Shakib gives this ample air on middle, Chamu has a crack at it, but does not middle the lofted strike. Liton shows good judgement and pouches it at long-off
full and on middle, driven to long-off
full on middle, turned through midwicket
straight ball on middle, forward defence
Shakib hangs it in the air and gets it to dip late to beat the attempted cut
darted onto the pads, nudged in front of square for one
full and on middle, tap-and-run single to mid-on
full and wobbles away outside off, Ervine ushers it through to the keeper
back of a length and angled away outside off with decent extra bounce. Drive and a miss from Ervine. Loose shot
left alone outside off again
Al-Amin snares the outside edge but it does not carry to first slip. Tight line outside off, as Ervine prods from the crease
flighted on middle, driven to the covers
slides outside off, left alone. Non-turning ball
dips teasingly on off, pushed down to long-off
Ervine gets across and blocks this hurrying ball to the leg side
clipped to square leg
fullish and on middle, milked to square leg
bouncer outside off, Jongwe ramps and does not connect
Al-Amin hits the repeat button. But this is too high and is deemed a wide
back of a length and comes in on middle, too close to cut. Chopped tamely in front of point
shortish and ducks back in to strike the pad before running down to third man
back of a length and outside off, pushed to mid-off
fourth-stump line, blocked off the front foot
twirled off the pads to long leg
Shakib strikes again. Ervine skips out, but does not meet the pitch. Instead of lofting it away, he scoops it feebly to Nasir at mid-off
slides on quick, blocked
eased down to long-on
Jongwe manufactures room outside leg, Shakib follows him. Pushed to off
tossed up, patted to the covers
full and on middle, knocked to midwicket
bouncer outside off with lots of legs on it, Jongwe can't help it over to third man
Jongwe succeeds now. Short and outside off, ramped to the right of a leaping keeper
back of a length and angled in on off, blocked back off an inside edge
length and outside off, Jongwe reaches out and slices a drive towards point
back of a length and largely holds its line on off, defended off the back foot

Two wickets in two overs for Bangladesh. Wide line outside off, Jongwe ill-advisedly chases it with a cut and nicks off with Mushfiq snapping a low catch and the drink would taste doubly sweet for the hosts
flighted impressively, Williams steps out, meets the pitch and lifts over mid-off
slog-swept from outside off to deep square leg
Chigumbura dances out and forces it to the left of long-off
leg-side wide
loopier on off, pokey drive back to the bowler
slower through the air, jammed back to the bowler after pressing forward... Just drops in front of the diving bowler
full and attacking the stumps, dead batted
pitched up and angled outside off, no stroke offered
short and on middle, Williams keeps back and defends it to point
short and outside off again. Blocked again
Al-Amin tucks the batsman up for room. Blocked in front of midwicket
Al-Amin hammers a short ball on middle, pulled behind square on the leg side. Not middled
Chigumbura punchily defends this short one to short cover
Chigumbura comes down the track, targets the leg side and ends up toe-ending it behind square on off
spins outside off, dabbed to point
flat and outside off, punched to the off-side sweeper
nice flight on middle, off the pad and sneaks away fine
bowled'em. Timbahh! Pushed through fairly quickly, keeps low as well to undo Williams. He makes room, exposes all three stumps but misses the cut. Shakib hits and celebrates with Mirpur
tossed up on middle, uppish drive wide of short cover
full and on middle, Raza bends forward in defence
driven back to the bowler, who dives to his left to stop the ball
flighted and dips on middle, pushed to mid-on. Chigumbura wants a single but is sent back
prodded and inside-edged onto the pad
straight roller on middle, played back to the bowler
arm-ball, arrows through, the batsman almost chopped it back onto the stumps
down the pitch and whipped through midwicket
driven straight to short cover
extra bounce, pushed to cover off the back foot
Raza strides forward and dead-bats it to leg
angled in, defended
down the pitch and whippily driven to long-on
pushed through on middle, blocked from the crease
Chigumbura eases a single to long-off after leaving the crease
keeps low and snakes back in, defended in front of mid-on, though awkwardly
full and on middle, pushed to the left of mid-on
played down to third man
length and outside off, glided to the right of third man
full and shoots low again. Raza has to stoop with it to defend
darted on off, jabbed to the covers
flat ball on middle, punched down the ground
down the pitch and driven to short mid-off
pushed to the covers
arm-ball on off, chopped to point
poked from a fourth-stump line to third man off the outside half
back of a length and outside off, Raza slashes it to third man
Mortaza sucks pace off this full ball on off, blocked with bat and pad close together
full and keeps low, defended back to the bowler
back of a length and on middle, glanced fine
flat and fired on off, dug out
slides on with extra bounce, blocked off the back foot
the stump is shattered at the non-strikers'. The stump saved umpire Dar. Down the track and flat-bat slap from Raza
darted flat and quick, takes the pad
forward and pushed to covers
Raza prods and gets an inside edge that wanders away towards short fine leg
fractionally short and outside off, helped to third man

belated appeal for caught behind and given! 200th ODI wicket for Mashrafe. Zimbabwe have lost half their side and Mutumbami is nursing an injured ankle. Raza uses his feet, Mashrafe is wary of it as he shortens his length. The batsman swings and edges it behind
pitched up and outside off, patted back to the bowler
tight line on off, blocked
back of a length and straightens past the groping bat
good length and on middle, Waller gets across and blocks it to midwicket
leg-stump ball, turned through square leg
pitched up and on off, driven into the covers
slides on flat on middle, blocked
punched wide of midwicket
put down by Shakib at slip. Pushed through outside off, Waller pokes and edges it low, but the man at slip fumbles it onto the floor
tucked away to long leg
back of a length and on middle, worked to right of midwicket
short and wide outside off, flashed to the covers
short and wide outside off, Waller goes for a cut and ends up spooning it into the lap of Nasir at backward point. Mashrafe has his second scalp
full and on middle, defended back
flat and on middle, down the track and slammed over long-on
looped up on off, patted past covers
flighted and pushed to short cover
pushed to the left of mid-on now
short and outside off, cut to sweeper
Chigumbura comes down the pitch again, he manufactures a full toss and belts it over long-on
good length and on middle, prodded to mid-on
full ball, which is weakly pushed to the covers
back of a length and outside off as Mashrafe draws a drive, edged past slip, to third man
full and straight, tucked through midwicket
picked away behind square on the leg side
pitched up and outside off, driven to the covers
back of a length and angled away, poked to third man off an outer edge
slower offcutter, Chigumbura is hoodwinked. He can't dab it down to third man
back of a length and slides away outside off with the angle, cut and a miss
fractionally short, dabbed wide of backward point
clipped to midwicket as this was very straight in line
short and Mustafiz hits the deck hard and produces some whippy pace as well. Defended to off
full ball on off, pushed to mid-on
back of a length and on off, turned to midwicket
clipped to midwicket, a fumble gives a single

Mashrafe shells a return catch. He pulls his length back outside off, slower in pace as well. Chigumbura dances out, checks his drive and lobs it back to the bowler. Mashrafe can't hang on in his followthrough
fullish and blocked down the ground
good length and outside off, Chigumbura goes for an agricultural swipe and misses
back of a length and outside off and that's steered to third man
dragged down the leg side, wide
big appeal for caught behind, umpire Dar shakes his head. Full and angled away, Cremer pushes with firm hands, the ball may have brushed the pad en route to Mushfiq
overpitched on off, Cremer scythes it away through point
and another! Length and around off, Cremer gets forward and pumps it over the covers
angled into the pads from round the stumps, eased to long leg
loads of air on off, scooped in front of point
Chigumbura steps down the pitch and drives this one to long-off
Shakib brings out the arm-ball, which snakes in with the angle and raps Cremer on the pad in line with middle and off. The forefinger goes up..
quick turn for Nasir, blocked
drifting into the pads, nudged through midwicket
turned off the pads through the same region
down the pitch and quietly blocked to cover
pushed to the left of the covers for one
Shakib gives this ample flight on off, driven to the covers
dangled outside off, guided to point
Maiden five-wicket haul in ODIs for Shakib. Tossed up full, Panyangara wants to swipe across the line but misses as Shakib rattles the stumps
full and drifts in, defended

Nasir has his hands aloft in joy; Bangladesh open the series with a crushing win. Chigumbura is the last man out. Mutumbami out with an injured ankle and will not come out to bat. Flattish and pushed through to ping the pad in front of middle and leg
